article_title: Morrisey Says `We Need to Start Over' on Obamacare
article_text:
Bloomberg ‹GO› Full Episode (05/11)

28:29 - Bloomberg ‹GO› hosted by Jonathan Ferro and Amanda Lang. Guests include Abhay Deshpande, founder and chief investment officer at Centerstone Investors, Barry Bannister, chief equity strategist at Stifel Nicolaus, Michael Gould, former chairman and chief executive officer at Bloomingdale's, Steven Wieting, global chief investment strategist at Citi Private Bank, Mike Siegel of Goldman Sachs Asset Management, Stan Meyers, analyst at Piper Jaffray, Bruce Bittles, chief investment strategist at Baird, and Gerardo Rodriguez, portfolio manager of emerging markets allocation fund at BlackRock. (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: March 4 -- Patrick Morrisey, Attorney General of West Virginia, talks about today's Supreme Court hearing on the validity of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act insurance-premium subsidies. Morrisey speaks with Erik Schatzker and Stephanie Ruhle on Bloomberg Television's "Market Makers."
